about.heading: Passion and pragmatism in software development
about.pitch: Software developer with 15 years of experience in creating commercial products and systems using a wide range of technologies. I focus on business aspects and the quality of delivered solutions. Specializes in architecture, software design, reactive systems, and software optimization.
